column1: To give users control of their own data. We are actively working with the rest of the community to build a decentralized network for all.
This summer Collab.Land will decentralize ownership of the Collab.Land project before moving to fully decentralized governance through the Collab.Land DAO.
To create community tools that enhance collaboration amongst human beings of all races
column4: genders
column6: abilities & beliefs by aligning incentives for a positive sum outcome.

column1: Open-source digital networks self-governing to become online institutions
column2: owned & operated by the members of these communities. As a result
column3: these communities begin working together for a better outcome for all creating a new form of digital democracy that evolves to enhance human collaboration.

column1: Collab.Land is open-sourcing web3 community tools & decentralizing the governance of itself to a network of contributors
column3: and partners. The Collab.Land DAO will work toward creating a mutually aligned model for the operator & user to share incentives. The Collab.Land DAO will prioritize product choices based on the DAO governance. By doing this we will generate better products catered to the requests of the community. As the Collab.Land product demand rises
column4: its token utilities & yields become in greater demand
column5: driving the value of the Collab.Land token.
